name: Jeskai Striker (Tarkir Dragonstorm Commander Precon Decklist)

main.name: Shiko and Narset, Unified
main.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy that spell if it targets a permanent or player, and you may choose new targets for the copy. If you don't copy a spell this way, draw a card.

card.name: Elsha, Threefold Master
card.oracle_text:
Trample
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Elsha deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 white Monk creature tokens with prowess.

card.name: Elsha, Threefold Master
card.oracle_text:
Trample
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Elsha deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 white Monk creature tokens with prowess.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Safe havens amid the desert and dragonstorms, Abzan fortresses attract merchants, travelers, outcasts, and exiles.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Sometimes restoring the lost archives of the Jeskai can be as simple as the quiet ruffle of pages and the smell of fresh ink.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text: Mardu lightning fences are the ingenious synthesis of blacksmith skill and stormsinger magic, protecting their dalkovans from even the most fearsome dragonstorms.

card.name: Aligned Heart
card.oracle_text: Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a rally counter on this enchantment. Then create a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess for each rally counter on it. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, the token gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
card.flavor_text: When hearts and minds align, so too do actions.

card.name: Adaptive Training Post
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if this artifact has fewer than three charge counters on it, put a charge counter on it.
Remove three charge counters from this artifact: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Caldera Pyremaw
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Then this creature deals damage equal to its power to target opponent.
card.flavor_text: It's the reason monks gave up on mapping Qadat.

card.name: Transcendent Dragon
card.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When this creature enters, if you cast it, counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard, then you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Voracious Bibliophile
card.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever you cast a spell with one or more targets, draw that many cards.
card.flavor_text: Finding all of the lost Jeskai archives was merely the first step to restoration. Wresting them from their draconic keeper proved much more challenging.

card.name: Transforming Flourish
card.oracle_text:
Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.)
Destroy target artifact or creature you don't control. If that permanent is destroyed this way, its controller exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card, then they may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Will of the Jeskai
card.oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both instead.
• Each player may discard their hand and draw five cards.
• Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Tempest Technique
card.oracle_text:
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies. Copies become tokens.)
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

card.name: Azorius Signet
card.flavor_text: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Glacial Fortress
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
card.flavor_text: Ships blown north in their voyage across the Stormwreck Sea become trapped in the unmelting ice.

card.name: Mangara, the Diplomat
card.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Whenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Big Score
card.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
card.flavor_text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

card.name: Mana Geyser
card.oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
card.flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

card.name: Curse of Opulence
card.oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
card.flavor_text: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

card.name: Storm-Kiln Artist
card.oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
card.flavor_text: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
card.flavor_text: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

card.name: Monastery Mentor
card.oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess.
card.flavor_text: "Speak little. Do much."

card.name: Vanquish the Horde
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Destroy all creatures.
card.flavor_text:
"Remind Zurgo that the Abzan will not tolerate his marauders. If the Mardu wish to trespass, then I encourage him to face my blade himself."
—Felothar, khan of the Abzan

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
card.flavor_text: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
card.oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
card.flavor_text: The Jeskai find potential recruits among all walks of life, including other clans.

card.name: Narset's Reversal
card.oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, then return it to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy.
card.flavor_text: "For every problem, a thousand answers. For every answer, a thousand branching consequences."

card.name: Dismantling Wave
card.oracle_text:
For each opponent, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
Cycling {6}{W}{W} ({6}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle this card, destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

card.name: Perilous Landscape
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Island, Mountain, or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {U}{R}{W} ({U}{R}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Talisman of Progress
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Irrigated Farmland
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text: The sunlight falls pristine on the temple at Epityr, softened by the remembered shadows of angelic saviors' wings.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
card.flavor_text:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
card.flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

card.name: Abrade
card.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
card.flavor_text: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

card.name: Prairie Stream
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.

card.name: Adarkar Wastes
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: Left barren by the Brothers' War, it stands as a stark reminder of Dominaria's likely fate should the Coalition fail.

card.name: Ash Barrens
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"As Terisiare's mines ran dry, scrap metal became increasingly plentiful."
—*The Antiquities War*

card.name: Sublime Epiphany
card.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

card.name: Rite of Replication
card.oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

card.name: Archmage Emeritus
card.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
card.flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

card.name: Veyran, Voice of Duality
card.oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Veyran gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
If you casting or copying an instant or sorcery spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Magma Opus
card.oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard this card: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Shiny Impetus
card.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Prismari Command
card.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target.
• Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.
• Target player creates a Treasure token.
• Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Consider
card.oracle_text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

card.name: Velomachus Lorehold
card.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R}.
card.flavor_text: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

card.name: Ferrous Lake
card.flavor_text: Stability and volatility churn together, creating beauty and danger both.

card.name: Frantic Search
card.oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
card.flavor_text: It took the banning of temporal manipulation at Tolaria West to teach its students the value of time.

card.name: Izzet Signet
card.flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

card.name: Pongify
card.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
card.flavor_text: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

card.name: Skycloud Expanse
card.flavor_text: From Otaria, the sun above meets the sea below at a glittering horizon.

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

card.name: Lier, Disciple of the Drowned
card.oracle_text:
Spells can't be countered.
Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.
card.flavor_text: Beneath the waves, lost gods stir in their slumber.

card.name: Expressive Iteration
card.oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
card.flavor_text: Prismari students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.

card.name: Temple of Triumph
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Boros Signet
card.flavor_text: Carved high into stone, the signet requires all to look up at it—whether with fear or admiration.

card.name: Ponder
card.oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

card.name: Preordain
card.oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Opt
card.oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

card.name: Baral's Expertise
card.oracle_text:
Return up to three target artifacts and/or creatures to their owners' hands.
You may cast a spell with mana value 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
card.flavor_text: "Get out of my way."

card.name: Curse of the Swine
card.oracle_text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.
card.flavor_text: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

card.name: Whirlwind of Thought
card.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card.
card.flavor_text: As Narset struggled to meditate, tiny dragonlings spiraled around her, conjuring thoughts of ancient clans.

card.name: Baral and Kari Zev
card.oracle_text:
First strike, menace
Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may cast a spell with lesser mana value that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you don't, create First Mate Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey Pirate creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Manaform Hellkite
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X red Dragon Illusion creature token with flying and haste, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.
card.flavor_text: The hydrorats were soon eradicated from the monastery.

card.name: Third Path Iconoclast
card.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
card.flavor_text: "When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail. I merely propose expanding our toolbox."

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: Dragonstorm chasers are not deterred by danger—they claim there is nothing like witnessing the land embracing the power of a storm.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
card.flavor_text:
"We have inherited the mysteries of the Thran, but few of the answers."
—Jhoira

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Mystic Monastery
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.
card.flavor_text: Through sun and storm, across steppe and swamp, Storm Crane Monastery flies wherever aid is needed.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Think Twice
card.oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

card.name: Ancestral Vision
card.oracle_text:
Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Target player draws three cards.

card.name: Electrodominance
card.oracle_text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
card.flavor_text: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."

card.name: Guttersnipe
card.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.
card.flavor_text: "Fire! Fire! Fire! What joy! What fire! Burn it all!"

card.name: Haughty Djinn
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Haughty Djinn's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
card.flavor_text: "I adore your outfit. It's so . . . rustic."

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W}.
card.flavor_text: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

card.name: Temple of Enlightenment
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Time Wipe
card.oracle_text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.
card.flavor_text:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi

Threshold — {T}: Spells you cast from your graveyard this turn cost {2} less to cast. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
